snippet: Russia has lost biathlon and speedskating events it was due to host this winter following allegations it ran a vast state-sponsored doping scheme....
lead_paragraph: Russia has lost biathlon and speedskating events it was due to host this winter following allegations it ran a vast state-sponsored doping scheme.

headline.main: Russia Loses Biathlon, Skating Events Over Doping
headline.print_headline: Russia Loses Biathlon, Skating Events Over Doping
